Conversations/Mods/Mistria_More_Dialogue: Oh, hey, [Ari]. What's up?
Hey, March! You're cute today!
Hey! Better now, for sure!
C-cute?
Well... I mean...
T-thanks... you're cute too.
Yeah. It's always nice speaking to you, [Ari].
You're looking very nice today.
I remember when you first came.
I really was a jerk, right?
I know it doesn't really change what happened, but...
I see now the great pearson you are.
And... I really hope we keep this relation we have.
[Ari], hey.
I've seen you forging sometimes...
You're really talented.
If you need any help or tips, I'm always here.
Oh... Hello, [Ari]...
March, are you okay?
You look kinda sad. Is everything okay?
Yeah, it's just...
Sometimes, I think I just don't deserve..., you know..., you.
I was such an idiot when you first arrive, and I treated you bad for so long...
And you only treated me well, gave me amazing gifts, and I just refused to accept I liked you in return.
Honestly, I don't know why you like me after all that.
Because I knew there was a softie underneath that attitude.
Because I challenged myself to make you like me, and I hate losing.
Because you're handsome, of course!
Well... I wouldn't say ''softie''...
But you really do make me feel comfortable, and I really know I can be just myself with you.
That sounds very softie for me.
If that's not softie, it's at least cute.
... M-maybe.
hehe. I think I was a tough one to win.
Still, I wish It had been easy.
No pain, no gain, right?
Me too, but I think It was all worth it.
heh. I think so.
It sure was.
Y-you... really think so?
Have you ever looked yourself in the mirror? You're gorgeous!
Of course! And I think two beautiful people like you and me really fit.
Well..., I'm glad you think so.
I think you're really beautiful too.
Hehe. We really do, right?
Anyways, Thanks for this chat. I really needed this. Thank you.
You're really special to me, [Ari], and I promise I'll never treat you like before.
Hey, babe, what's up?
I-I call you 'babe', right?
Hey, [Ari]. Your eyes are pretty, you know that?
I-I mean... If you don't, you should.
Hey. Just for you to know...
You can talk to me about anything.
What I want to say is...
You can always trust me.
Your farm is growing so well.
I'm... proud of you.
Ever since we started dating, I feel kinda... lonely when I'm in bed at night.
You should... stay overnight any other day.
My hair's so smooth today.
Here, you c-can touch it, if you want.
What's up,[Ari].
Let's go fishing anyday, just the two of us.
Hey, babe.
I know I don't say it very often...
But I really like you
Hey, [Ari].
C-can you massage my arm?
It's hurting a little.
'Sup, [Ari].
Nice outfit.
I was little sleppy today.
But seeing you is an insta-coffee.
It's nice to feel the spring breeze while I work at the forge.
And I think it's nice for a picnic.
W-we should do it any of these days, right?
[Ari]. I... asked Celine her prettiest flower.
H-here. It's for you.
Congratulations, babe. I knew you would win.
I bet it was easy for you. I should make a trophy.
That was sick. You always get to surprise me. I'm proud of you.
You almost did it. I'm sure next year you're gonna win.
Hey, you almost beated Celine. That's no small deed.
I'm still proud of you.
How can Celine collect so many Breaths of Spring? I think you should've won.
Jeez, not even a medal?
If you want, I-I can help you next year.
Don't be sad, [Ari]. Let's enjoy the rest of the festival together.
Sorry about the competition.
D-do you want  a hug?
Honestly, if it weren't for you, this festival would be so boring.
There some fancy flowers for sale here.
Do you want any?
If Olric didn't make me stay here at the festival, we could run away for a bit.
I-if you want, of course.
